data.question: What is the publication year of the article discussing the synthesis and structures of vanadium nitride linear chain polymers and monomers?

data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society

data.question: What are the names of the first and last authors of the article titled 'Vanadium nitride linear chain polymers and monomers. Synthesis and structures of [V(.mu.-N)Cl2(py)2].infin. and V(N)Cl2(quin)2'?
data.answer: Susan C. Critchlow and Nancy M. Doherty

data.question: Considering the synthesis conditions, which compound's structure was analyzed using anisotropic thermal parameters?
data.answer: Both [V(//~N)CI^(NC^Hg)m and V^C^NC^H^^ were analyzed using anisotropic thermal parameters.

data.question: How does the bond distance between V and N1 in [V(//~N)CI^(NC^Hg)m compare to that in V(N)CI^2?
data.answer: The bond distance between V and N1 in [V(//~N)CI^(NC^Hg)m is 1.571(7) Å, while in V(N)CI^2 it is 1.568(19) Å, indicating they are very similar.
